original_text: So you must refuse to do any evil things. Do not tell lies to deceive people. Do not be hypocrites. Do not be jealous of other people. Do not say bad things against other people. Kings 6-8. The stone at the corner of the house was the most important stone. It made the whole building strong and safe. It was the first stone that the builders put into its place. Then they put other stones next to it and above it, to build the walls. It was a big, square stone with very straight sides. So it made all the walls of the house straight and strong. Jesus is like the stone at the corner of God's house. God's true house is a spiritual house. God builds his true house with people who belong to Jesus Christ. Peter 1 Peter 3
korean_text: 그러므로 모든 악독과 모든 기만과 외식과 시기와 모든 비방하는 말을 버리고

sentences.original_text: So you must refuse to do any evil things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 악한 행위들을 거절해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Do not tell lies to deceive people.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들을 속이기 위해 거짓말을 하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: Do not be hypocrites.
Do not be jealous of other people.
Do not say bad things against other people.
Kings 6-8.
The stone at the corner of the house
was the most important stone.
It made the whole building strong and safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 전체 건물을 튼튼하고 안전하게 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: It was the first stone
that the builders put into its place.
Then they put other stones next to it
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그들은 다른 돌들을 그것 옆에 놓았고

sentences.original_text: and above it, to build the walls.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 위에 벽을 쌓기 위해 놓았다.

sentences.original_text: It was a big, square stone
with very straight sides.
So it made all the walls of the house
straight and strong.
Jesus is like the stone
at the corner of God's house.
God's true house is a spiritual house.
God builds his true house
with people who belong to Jesus Christ.
Peter 1 Peter 3
